title: BACKLOG
content:
will there be summer classes held for students who have backlogs from first sem and if so in which month are the summer backlog exams held. Plus do students with backlogs get summer vacation or not?
Thanks

comments.body: There are no summer classes for backlogs. Backlogs are usually in the summer term so if I remember correctly, they are in June (could be mistaken, reach out to COE). Yes, you will get a summer vacation regardless.
No classes. The exams would be held in the month of July.
